author: cnbc.com
title: Mary Boosalis Joins Hub Group’s Board of Directors
text:
OAK BROOK, Ill., May 29, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hub Group Inc . (NASDAQ:HUBG), one of the largest multi-modal solutions providers in North America, announced today that Mary Boosalis, President and CEO of Premier Health, has been elected as an independent director to Hub Group’s board of directors.
As CEO of Premier Health, Ms. Boosalis has gained valuable executive experience in all aspects of business. Having served on numerous civic committees and boards, Ms. Boosalis is able to advise on public outreach and best practices across different industries.
Ms. Boosalis is a diplomat for the American College of Healthcare Executives and a member of the Ohio Hospital Association and the Greater Dayton Area Hospital Association Boards. She is a member of the University of Dayton Board of Trustees, serving on the Executive Committee, chairing the Finance Committee and is a member of the Compensation, Research and Scholarship Committees. Additionally, she is a member of the Dayton Development Coalition Board, the Dayton Business Committee, the Dayton Minority Inclusion Committee and the Learn to Earn Board. Ms. Boosalis has been named to the Top 10 Women list by the Dayton Daily News, as an Ohio Most Powerful and Influential Woman by the Ohio Diversity Council, and as a Woman of Influence by the Dayton YWCA.
“Mary is an experienced executive and great strategic mind and we are excited to welcome her to Hub Group’s board of directors,” said David Yeager , Hub Group Chairman and Chief Executive Officer. “We believe her broad experience as a Chief Executive Officer will be extremely valuable to Hub Group.”
“I'm excited to join this board as we work to ensure Hub Group remains the industry leader by delivering value to its shareholders and superior service to its customers," said Ms. Boosalis.
ABOUT HUB GROUP: Hub Group Inc . is a transportation management company that provides multi-modal solutions throughout North America, including intermodal, truck brokerage, dedicated and logistics services. As a publicly traded company with $4 billion in revenue, Hub Group’s organization of over 4,000 employees delivers innovative, customer-focused solutions and industry leading service to help customers better control supply chains and their costs. For more information, visit www.hubgroup.com .
Hub Group Inc. Maralee Volchko 630-271-3745
